experience.title: Human Resources Team Lead
experience.description: Recruitment: job posting, screening candidates, interviews (telephonic and face- face), evaluation of candidates and assessment centers.Employees engagement : Conducting fun activities department wise to break the ice and make the employees to coordinate with the team well.Employer Branding and Personnel Marketing: Contacting universities and participating in job fairs.HR administration: Organization chart and headcount update, induction and exit procedure, issuing letters and certificates, leave management and other day- day tasks.

experience.title: Management Intern
experience.description: Built team requirement for project and prepared every day KPIs of employee and store•Virtual merchandising•Responsible for time management and deadline•Sales perspective analysis:• Define the customer requirement• Analyze the data to investigate the market demand• Verify cause-and-effect through past data• Cost-benefit analysis• Regression analysis•SIPOC analysis (Suppliers, Inputs, Process, Outputs, Customers):• Store asset management• Inventory management• Resource allocation•Staff and customer grievance:• Increase customer satisfaction• Quantitative and qualitative marketing research through use of Mission Happiness system•Involved in recruitment of freshers•Staff periodical training•Standard operating procedure:• Improve or optimize the current process• Mistake proofing and standard work to create a new, future state process• Ensure that any deviations from the target are corrected before they result in defects
